baseData.description:
Fanfare: Randomly activate one of the following effects X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0, and the ability to ignore enemy followers' Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.

Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a Cocytus Deck.

Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Assembly Droids.

Ignore enemy followers' Ward.

baseData.description:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower X times. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed this match.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied Machina followers (excluding Technolord) that has been destroyed this match.

Ambush.
Drain.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to all other allied followers.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.

Drain.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.

baseData.description:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Whenever you play another follower for the first time on each of your turns, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.

evoData.description: Whenever you play another follower for the first time on each of your turns, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.

----------
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.

----------
Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
Ward.

evoData.description: Ward.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Basic cards from the enemy leader's class into your hand and subtract 3 from their costs.

Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Mjerrabaine, Omen of One), give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if only one allied follower is in play, give +2/+2 to a random allied follower, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if at least 6 allied followers have evolved this match, put this card from your deck into play.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.

evoData.description:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.

baseData.description:
Fanfare: Restore 6 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Restore 10 defense instead.

Fanfare: Destroy a follower. If it is an allied follower, randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this match. If it is an enemy follower, randomly summon an enemy copy of an enemy follower that has been destroyed during this match.

Rush.
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied Naterran Great Tree has been destroyed this match, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. If at least 3 Naterran Great Trees have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - If there are no allied Viridia Magnas in play, summon a Viridia Magna, evolve it, then remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

evoData.description: Ward.

baseData.description:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your sixth, ninth, and twelfth turn, restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your seventh, tenth, and thirteenth turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. At the end of your eighth, eleventh, and fourteenth turn, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

evoData.description: Ward.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Give +3/+0 to a follower. Give that follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to this follower.

Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.

At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to an allied follower. If there are any Natura cards in your hand, give +2/+2 instead.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

evoData.description: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers that cost 1 play point or less.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.

evoData.description: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Put a Keen Enchantment into your hand.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

evoData.description: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

baseData.description:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Enhance (10): Gain +4/+4 more.

Whenever an allied follower evolves, if only 1 allied follower is in play, change the cost of this card to 3.
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.

Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 5 play points and an allied Heaven's Gate is not in play, put a Heaven's Gate from your deck into play.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: At the start of your turn, subtract 3 from the cost of a random card in your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in your deck, subtract 10 instead.
Banish an enemy follower or amulet. Both players draw a card.

Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Fanfare: If your leader's defense is less than your opponent's, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, evolve this follower.

evoData.description: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.

baseData.description:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.

evoData.description: Ward.

baseData.description: Fanfare: If an enemy follower is in play, change this follower's attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to the attack and defense of a random enemy follower.
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Natura cards from your deck into your hand.
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand - Goblin or Goblin Leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Draw a card.
Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain Rush.

evoData.description: Evolve: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain +2/+2.

baseData.description: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.

evoData.description: Last Words: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.

baseData.description:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have 2 play points and no cards in play and your opponent has at least 1 card in play, put this card from your deck into play.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +7/+7 and Ward.
Fanfare: Put an Investigation into your hand.

baseData.description: Give +4/+0 to a follower, then deal 4 damage to that follower.

Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
If you can evolve and have more evolution points than your opponent, put a Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand.

Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
At the start of your turn, give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.

Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +1/+0.
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower with no card text Ward.
